    Function reference

    All functions

    Connector()
    A Connector object, a special list with R6 objects.
    Connector_dbi_object Connector_dbi
    R6 class for a dbi connection, see connector_dbi (used to interact with DBI compliant database backends)
    Connector_fs_object Connector_fs
    Class Connector_fs
    assert_ext()
    Test the extension of files
    assert_path()
    Validate the path and access
    connect_from_yaml()
    Connect datasources to the connections from the yaml content
    connector_dbi()
    Create a new DBI connector object to interact with DBI compliant database backends
    connector_fs()
    Create FS connector
    read() write() remove() list_content() disconnect() tbl()
    Defaults method for connector object
    create_backend()
    Create a backend
    create_backend_dbi()
    Create a backend for the DBI (databases)
    create_backend_fs()
    Create a backend for the file system
    disconnect(<Connector_dbi>)
    Disconnect from the database
    error_extension()
    Error extension Function to call when no method is found for the extension
    example_read_ext()
    Example for creating a new method for reading files
    find_file()
    Find File
    get_backend_fct()
    Get the backend function
    list_content(<Connector_dbi>)
    List tables in the database
    list_content(<Connector_fs>)
    List content of the directory
    options
    connector Options
    read(<Connector_dbi>)
    Read a table from the database
    read(<Connector_fs>)
    Read files for the Connector_fs class
    read_ext()
    Read a file based on this extension
    read_file()
    Read files based on the extension
    read_yaml_config()
    Read and parse yaml configuration file
    remove(<Connector_dbi>)
    Remove a table from the database
    remove(<Connector_fs>)
    Remove a file or directory
    supported_fs()
    List of supported files
    tbl(<Connector_dbi>)
    Create a tbl object
    try_connect()
    Create a backend
    write(<Connector_dbi>)
    Write a table to the database
    write(<Connector_fs>)
    Write a file based on this extension
    write_ext()
    Write a file based on this extension
    write_file()
    Write a file based on this extension
